kdtree module¶

class kdtree.kdtree(points, is_axis_x, p_in_leaf)¶

Bases: object

Kd-tree object, builded recursively

Parameters

  • points – Points to be in kd tree

  • is_axis_x – Initial axis seperator

  • p_in_leaf – Max points in Leaf

filter(radius, angle)¶

Filter ot the points in two types according to threshold algorithm

Parameters

  • radius (float) – Searched radius in meters

  • angle (float) – Treshold angle in degrees

Returns

Two lists of points ground and objects

Return type

list,list

getlists()¶
intersect_or_inside(center, radius, corners)¶
static pointsInRadius(tree, point, radius, list=[])¶

Checks relevant nodes if the intersect with circle

Parameters

  • point (list) – Examinated point

  • radius (float) – Radius from that point

  • list – Empty list for backwards points collecting (recusively)

Returns

List of points that potentialy to be in radius

Return type

list
